sentences.en: "We're not that contrived. We're not that theatrical." — "That's a matter of opinion."
sentences.cn: “我们没那么造作，也没那么夸张。”——“见仁见智喽。”

sentences.en: Acting with an amateur theatrical group can be fun.
sentences.cn: 和业余戏剧团一起演出可能是有趣的.

sentences.en: For two decades her theatrical talents were ignored by the film industry.
sentences.cn: 她的舞台表演天赋在电影行业中被埋没了20年。

sentences.en: He was a baroque figure dressed in theatrical, but elegant, clothes.
sentences.cn: 他是个巴罗克式的人物，衣着华丽但又不失优雅。

sentences.en: I gave a theatrical bow and waved.
sentences.cn: 我夸张地鞠了个躬，然后挥手致意。

sentences.en: It is given a typically thoughtful production with just enough theatrical fireworks.
sentences.cn: 该剧在制作上一如既往地花费了心思，舞台演出效果也相当精彩。

sentences.en: Jessica dipped into her store of theatrical anecdotes.
sentences.cn: 杰西卡翻阅了自己收集的大量演艺界的趣闻轶事资料。

sentences.en: She always makes some theatrical gesture.
sentences.cn: 她老在做些夸张的手势.

sentences.en: She knew many theatrical personalities and had worked, among others, with George Bernard Shaw.
sentences.cn: 她认识许多戏剧界人物，并与乔治·萧伯纳等很多人共过事。

sentences.en: The clothes were very showy, very theatrical.
sentences.cn: 那些衣服很艳丽很华美，像戏装一样。

sentences.en: The final scene was dismayingly lacking in theatrical effect.
sentences.cn: 最后一场缺乏戏剧效果,叫人失望.

sentences.en: The theatrical troupe is touring the country.
sentences.cn: 剧团正在全国各地巡回演出.

sentences.en: The work demanded boundless energy and theatrical imagination.
sentences.cn: 这种工作需要具备无限的精力和夸张的想象力。

sentences.en: These are the prizes given for the most outstanding British theatrical performances of the year.
sentences.cn: 这些奖项将要颁发给本年度英国最杰出的戏剧表演作品。
